channel.title: Welcome to My Site, Stranger!
channel.description: Recent content on Welcome to My Site, Stranger!

item.title: About Me
item.description: Iâ€™m a scalable, highly available and reliable engineer who is transitioning from the oilfield to the cloud. I strongly believe in education and hands-on experience to shape up a well-rounded engineer, which shall result in a valuable asset to any future employer. I graduated from the George Washington University with a bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering (yes, the wheel was invented by a mechanical engineer). Making a career shift is never a simple task.

item.title: Tutorials
item.description: I find self-learning is the most significant and effective skill among all skills someone can acquire; however, there is a need for the proper tools to acquire the self-learning skill. Here comes in tutorial to fill the gap which is a VERY important teaching/learning tool. It helps people learn new skills by using a step by step process, which ensures the optimal comprehension of the materials or the subject. As an engineer, I have, fortunately, acquired self-learning skill during my engineering school.
